data.lyric:
[ti:Love Is A Game]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]Love Is A Game - Adele
[00:00.88]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Dean Josiah Cover
[00:01.81]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Dean Josiah Cover
[00:02.89]
[00:21.45]All your expectations of my love are impossible
[00:33.87]
[00:35.47]Surely you know that I'm not easy to hold
[00:46.45]
[00:48.21]It's so sad how incapable of learning to grow I am
[01:02.63]
[01:03.83]My heart speaks in puzzle and codes
[01:08.31]
[01:09.29]I've been trying my whole life to solve
[01:15.59]
[01:17.07]God only knows how I've cried
[01:23.20]
[01:24.64]I can't take another defeat
[01:28.41]
[01:30.03]A next time would be the ending of me
[01:36.45]
[01:38.11]Now that I see ee-ee ee-ee
[01:43.56]
[01:44.28]That love
[01:45.65]Ooh-ooh
[01:46.90]Is a game
[01:48.06]Ooh-ooh
[01:48.49]For fools to play
[01:53.87]Ooh ooh ooh
[01:54.22]And I ain't fooling
[01:56.54]Fooling
[01:57.30]What a cruel thing
[01:58.82]Cruel thing
[01:59.81]To self-inflict that pain yeah yeah-yeah yeah
[02:05.32]Love
[02:06.41]Ooh-ooh
[02:07.60]Is a game
[02:08.95]Ooh-ooh
[02:09.35]For fools to play
[02:15.35]And I ain't fooling
[02:17.06]Fooling
[02:18.38]What a cruel thing
[02:19.74]Cruel thing
[02:20.85]To self-inflict that pain
[02:25.90]
[02:26.71]How unbelievable
[02:30.70]Unbelievable
[02:31.83]Of me to fall for the lies that I tell
[02:38.26]Lies I tell
[02:40.26]The dream that I sell
[02:43.28]Dream I sell
[02:46.06]When heartache it's inevitable
[02:51.48]It's inevitable
[02:51.88]But I'm no good at doing it well
[02:56.89]Not that I care
[02:59.00]I don't care
[03:01.59]Why should anything about it be fair
[03:07.64]When love
[03:08.94]Ooh-ooh
[03:10.21]Is a game
[03:11.49]Ooh-ooh
[03:11.97]For fools to play
[03:17.86]And I ain't fooling
[03:19.68]Fooling
[03:20.80]What a cruel thing
[03:22.35]Cruel thing
[03:23.26]To self-inflict that pain yeah yeah-yeah yeah
[03:28.83]Love
[03:29.99]Ooh-ooh
[03:31.07]Is a game
[03:32.29]Ooh-ooh
[03:32.71]For fools to play
[03:38.62]And I ain't fooling again
[03:40.71]Fooling
[03:41.72]What a cruel thing
[03:43.05]Cruel thing
[03:44.09]To self-inflict that pain
[03:48.64]No amount of love can keep me satisfied
[03:56.44]Satisfied satisfied
[03:58.52]
[03:59.20]I can't keep up
[04:01.46]Can't keep up can't keep up
[04:03.35]When I keep changing my mind
[04:06.70]Change my mind change my mind
[04:08.71]
[04:09.58]The feelings flood me to the heights of no compromise
[04:20.58]
[04:22.30]Love
[04:23.32]Ooh-ooh
[04:24.69]Is a game
[04:25.91]Ooh-ooh
[04:26.42]For fools to play
[04:32.06]And I ain't fooling
[04:33.95]Fooling
[04:35.09]What a cruel thing
[04:36.66]Cruel thing
[04:37.67]To self-inflict that pain yeah yeah-yeah yeah
[04:43.16]Love
[04:44.19]Ooh-ooh
[04:45.39]Is a game
[04:46.61]Ooh-ooh
[04:47.05]For fools to play
[04:52.29]
[04:53.09]And I ain't fooling
[04:54.93]Fooling
[04:56.21]What a cruel thing
[04:57.56]Cruel thing
[04:58.48]To self-inflict that pain
[05:12.16]
[06:05.99]I can love I can love again
[06:14.23]I love me now like I love him
[06:19.50]I'm a fool for that
[06:21.68]
[06:22.74]You know I you know I'm gonna do it
[06:25.53]
[06:26.49]Oh-oh oh-oh
[06:29.06]
[06:29.70]I'd do it all again like I did it
